sentences.english: Roosevelt, avid for war, undertook a desperate gamble.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯福，渴望戰爭，他就此孤注一擲。

sentences.english: He careened through foreign territories on a desperate kind of blitz.
sentences.chinese: 在孤注一擲地閃電戰中他猛衝過外國領地。

sentences.english: And risk it all on one turn of pitch-and-toss.
sentences.chinese: 孤注一擲的冒險失敗後。

sentences.english: The thirty - six Enterprise dive-bomber were being squandered in a jittery shot from the hip.
sentences.chinese: 這三十六架“企業號”上的俯衝轟炸機正被孤注一擲。

sentences.english: Then Caspian decided to risk everything on one stroke.
sentences.chinese: 於是凱斯賓決定孤注一擲。

sentences.english: This did not yet tempt them to adventures staking Soviet assets.
sentences.chinese: 這還沒有促使他們把蘇聯的老本拿來孤注一擲。

sentences.english: Could you risk everything for the chance of being alone ?
sentences.chinese: 你能否孤注一擲，最後卻換來孤獨寂寞？

sentences.english: He hazarded a week's salary on a game of chance.
sentences.chinese: 他把一星期的薪水孤注一擲地賭了。

sentences.english: In desperation, he decided to throw the helve after the hatchet, in tribute tea against Hu poisoned.
sentences.chinese: 情急之下，他決定孤注一擲，在貢茶裏下毒陷害胡家。

sentences.english: With no time to think the yearnings gave up everything for a shot.
sentences.chinese: 來不及細想思念從此孤注一擲。

sentences.english: Kind of like going all-in on a poker hand.
sentences.chinese: 如同撲克牌中的孤注一擲。

sentences.english: He hazarded all his money to save the business.
sentences.chinese: 他孤注一擲，拿出了所有的錢來挽救企業。

sentences.english: Democrates may be ready for an all or nothing gamble on health care reform.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨可能準備對醫療改革方案進行孤注一擲的冒險。

sentences.english: He gambled his savings to start a small shop.
sentences.chinese: 他孤注一擲用自己的積蓄開了一家小商店。
